titleStmt.title: Amanda: or, The reformed whore. Composed, and made by Thomas Cranley gent. now a prisoner in the Kings-bench, Anno Dom. 1635
titleStmt.author: Cranley, Thomas, fl. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J[ohn] Norton], and are to be sold at the golden Key [..],

notesStmt.note: Collates A⁴ (-A4 = N1) B-M⁴ N¹ (=A4); in the Bodleian Library copy A4 is still in its original position.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
